TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttributeCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 ASP.NET 服务器控件元素的开始标记中声明的所有特性的对象模型访问。

span.span: Provides object-model access to all attributes declared in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control element.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的各个项返回 对象作为其值。Individual items in the collection return a object as their value. 如果集合中没有特性项，则集合返回 `null` 。If there are no attribute items in the collection, the collection returns `null`. HTML 服务器控件上的特性通过 属性（由所有 HTML 服务器控件继承）以编程方式提供。Attributes on an HTML server control are programmatically available through the property, which is inherited by all HTML server controls. ASP.NET 公开 HTML 服务器控件的属性作为这些控件的属性。ASP.NET exposes attributes of HTML server controls as properties of those controls. 您可以通过属性向 Web 服务器控件添加特性 ，该属性由所有 Web 服务器控件继承。You can add attributes to a Web server control through the property, which is inherited by all Web server controls. Web 服务器控件的特性集合中的特性不一定对应于该控件的强类型属性。The attributes in the attributes collection for a Web server control do not necessarily correspond to the control's strongly typed properties for that control. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个名为的新 对象 `myAttributeCollection` ，然后检查该页是否已回发。The following example creates a new object that is named `myAttributeCollection`, and then checks whether the page has been posted back. 如果没有，则代码会将两个属性添加到集合中。If it has not, the code adds two attributes to the collection. 然后，它获取集合中的属性数，并循环访问集合，并将每个属性的键写入页面。It then gets the number of attributes in the collection and iterates through the collection, writing the key to each attribute to the page. 如果该页为回发，则代码将获取新的属性数并循环访问集合，并将每个属性的键和值写入页面。If the page is a postback, the code gets the new number of attributes and iterates through the collection, writing the key and value of each attribute to the page. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#1)]

The attribute value.

summary.span: 将特性添加到服务器控件的 对象。

span.span: Adds an attribute to a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数中的字符串 `value` 包含与号 ( # A0) ，则自动对字符进行编码。If the string in the `value` parameter contains an ampersand (&), the character is automatically encoded. 生成的 HTML 表示形式为 " & "。The resulting HTML representation is "&". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以 编程方式将属性添加到 ASP.NET 服务器控件 对象。The following example shows how to use the method to programmatically add an attribute to an ASP.NET server control object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AddAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 实例，它将这些特性写入 ASP.NET 服务器控件的开始标记中。

span.span: An instance that writes the attribute to the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 将特性从 类添加到 对象中，该对象负责将这些特性以标记形式呈现。

span.span: Adds attributes from the class to the object that is responsible for rendering the attributes as markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将所有服务器控件的特性复制到对象中， 以便在下一次调用方法时可以呈现它们 。This method copies all the server control's attributes to an object so that they can be rendered by the next call to the method. 对于其他控件（如和）中包含的 控件 ，可以通过直接呈现包含的控件来提高性能。For controls that are contained in other controls such as and , you can potentially improve performance by rendering the contained controls directly. 即使容器控件要求你将所有子控件属性复制到容器控件，并在复制它们后呈现这些属性，直接呈现的速度可能比通过容器控件呈现的速度要快。Rendering directly can be faster than rendering through the container control because container controls require that you copy all the child control attributes to the container control and render them after they are copied. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将新特性添加到名为的 服务器控件 `myButton` 和 名为的服务器控件 `myTextBox` 。The following example shows how to add new attributes to a server control named `myButton` and a server control named `myTextBox`. 然后，将这些特性添加到一个自定义 对象，该对象将这些特性写入每个控件的输出流中。It then adds those attributes to a custom object that will write those attributes to an output stream for each of those controls. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_Item/CS/attributecollection_item.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_Item#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_Item/VB/attributecollection_item.vb.aspx#1)]

[!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/CS/attributecollection_attributecollection.cs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_AttributeCollection/VB/attributecollection_attributecollection.vb.aspx#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CssStyle As CssStyleCollection
public: property System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ CssStyle { System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 对象所属的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的样式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of styles for the ASP.NET server control to which the current object belongs.

value.span: 一个包含当前服务器控件样式的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the styles for the current server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析包含 ASP.NET 网页时，为特定 HTML 服务器控件声明的任何样式将添加到 对象。Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the object when the containing ASP.NET Web page is parsed. 您可以使用此属性来添加、移除和循环访问为服务器控件声明的样式。You can use this property to add, remove, and iterate through the styles declared for the server control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将 CSS 样式值添加到服务器控件的 对象。The following example shows how to add a CSS style value programmatically to a server control's object. 单击按钮时，名为的服务器控件的背景颜色将 `TextBox1` 设置为服务器控件中名为的选定项 `DropDownList1` 。When a button is clicked, the background color of a server control named `TextBox1` is set to the selected item in a server control named `DropDownList1`. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection_CssStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_CssStyle/CS/attributecollection_cssstyle.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection_CssStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection_CssStyle/VB/attributecollection_cssstyle.vb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 要与此实例进行比较的对象实例。

span.span: The object instance to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 确定 对象的当前实例是否等于指定的对象。

span.span: Determines whether the current instance of the object is equal to the specified object.

returns.span: 如果包含在 参数中的对象等于 的当前实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object that is contained in the parameter is equal to the current instance of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使比较的对象相等，必须满足以下条件：For the compared objects to be equal, they must meet the following criteria: - 参数中包含的对象 `o` 必须是 对象。The object that is contained in the `o` parameter must be an object. - 这两个集合必须包含相同数量的项。Both collections must contain the same number of items. - 两个集合中每个条目的键值必须匹配。The key value of each entry in both collections must match. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers.

The attribute value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以向使用此属性的 ASP.NET 服务器控件添加特性，也可以从该控件中检索特性。You can add an attribute to or retrieve one from an ASP.NET server control that uses this property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置动态 HTML `onblur` 特性，以便在 Web 服务器控件失去焦点时，运行 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 命令。The following example shows how to set a dynamic HTML `onblur` attribute to run an ECMAScript (JavaScript) command when a Web server control loses focus. summary.span: 获取服务器控件的 对象中所有特性的键集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of keys to all attributes in the server control's object.
The collection of keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含 ASP.NET 服务器控件的中的所有键 ，无论你是以编程方式使用方法还是以声明方式添加它们 。This property contains all the keys that are in the of an ASP.NET server control, whether you have added them programmatically with the method, or declaratively. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何循环访问 服务器控件的对象的属性 。The following example shows how to iterate through the property of the object for an server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Keys Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The name of the attribute to remove.

summary.span: 从服务器控件的 对象中移除一个特性。

span.span: Removes an attribute from a server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 对象不包含具有指定的属性 `key` ，则集合保持不变。If the object does not contain an attribute that has the specified `key`, the collection remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式从 HTML 服务器控件的对象中移除特性 。The following example shows how to programmatically remove an attribute from an HTML server control's object. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AttributeCollection.Remove Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

param.name: writer
param.span: 将特性集合写入当前输出流的 实例。

span.span: An instance that writes the attribute collection to the current output stream.

summary.span: 将特性集合写入该集合所属的控件的指定 输出流。

span.span: Writes the collection of attributes to the specified output stream for the control to which the collection belongs.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何从 类继承以创建一个名为的自定义控件 `AttribRender` ，该控件重写 方法。The first code example shows how to inherit from the class to create a custom control named `AttribRender` that overrides the method. 第二个代码示例演示如何在 ASP.NET 网页中使用自定义控件。The second code example shows how to use the custom control in an ASP.NET Web page. 下面的示例演示如何创建一个名为的自定义控件 `AttribRender` ，该控件重写 类的方法 而不调用 基类的方法。The following example shows how to create a custom control named `AttribRender` that overrides the method of the class without calling the method of the base class. 改 `AttribRender` 为调用 方法。Instead, `AttribRender` invokes the method. [!code-csharp[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/CS/attributecollection_render.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/VB/attributecollection_render.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示如何 `AttribRender` 在网页中使用自定义控件。The following example shows how to use the `AttribRender` custom control in a Web page. 它假定自定义控件的代码文件位于应用程序的 App_Code 文件夹中。It assumes that the code file for the custom control is in the App_Code folder for the application. [!code-aspx-csharp[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/CS/attributecollection_rendercs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AttributeCollection.Render_Sample1/VB/attributecollection_rendervb.aspx#2)]
